data.lyrics:
[00:00.30]Hu 66 - Wrap
[00:00.81]Lyrics: Li Junyi
[00:00.96]Composer: Tuo Jinglin
[00:01.11]Recording: Chen Qiujie
[00:01.26]Arrangement: Jin Ruochen
[00:02.02]Strings: Huiyin Chamber Orchestra
[00:02.22]Vocal Arrangement: A'nan
[00:02.43]Producer: Chen Qiujie
[00:03.29]Mixing & Mastering: Chen Qiujie
[00:03.49]Recording Studio: Hikoon Beijing
[00:04.04]Production Company: Hikoon Music
[00:05.81]OP: Qigu Culture
[00:26.51]Don't give me comfort
[00:29.08]Let despair come more fiercely
[00:37.60]That hunger like iron
[00:40.33]Stabs deep in my heart so directly
[00:46.55]Can still laugh while crying
[00:49.55]Is it direct enough
[00:52.03]Even sobbing is just compromise
[00:57.79]Drain all the blood from my heart
[01:00.57]Is this what love
[01:03.35]At its highest level is
[01:09.30]Loving someone until they detest you deeply
[01:14.46]Trying hard to cater to this feeling of hunting
[01:20.28]This kind of pleasure
[01:22.91]Are you tired, so clever and cold
[01:31.85]A relationship easily wrapped up by you
[01:37.01]What graceful way to exit is correct
[01:43.07]Still sincerely thank you
[01:45.70]For that last bit of
[01:49.94]Step
[02:19.40]That hunger like iron
[02:22.03]Stabs deep in my heart so directly
[02:28.00]Can still laugh while crying
[02:30.79]Is it direct enough
[02:33.57]Even sobbing is just compromise
[02:39.30]Drain all the blood from my heart
[02:42.08]Is this what love
[02:44.96]At its highest level is
[02:50.85]Loving someone until they detest you deeply
[02:56.37]Trying hard to cater to this feeling of hunting
[03:02.14]This kind of pleasure
[03:05.12]Are you tired, so clever and cold
[03:13.90]A relationship easily wrapped up by you
[03:19.16]What graceful way to exit is correct
[03:24.72]Still sincerely thank you
[03:27.61]For that last bit of
[03:31.05]Step
[03:36.57]Loving someone until they detest you deeply
[03:41.62]Trying hard to cater to this feeling of hunting
[03:47.34]This kind of pleasure
[03:50.33]Are you tired, so clever and cold
[03:59.08]A relationship easily wrapped up by you
[04:04.44]What graceful way to exit is correct
[04:09.96]Still sincerely thank you
[04:12.59]For that last bit of
[04:19.60]Step
